body: Tours of private houses and of historic houses specially decorated by designers are taking place this month. Proceeds will benefit charities. Tours of Designer Houses April 18-May 30. ''Castles on the Sound II'' is a guided tour of the former Gould-Guggenheim estate. This 34-room mansion was built in the style of a medieval English manor. The rooms
title: TOURS OF HOUSES TO BENEFIT CHARITIES
